description: To vary condition 2 attached to 15F/1790 (To erect extension external terrace, raised timber walkway and associated external alterations to clubhouse in connection with creation of new cafe, Widen existing vehicular access, create additional 56 parking spaces and lay out associated hard and soft landscaping) so as to incorporate covered access/escape stair, glazed balcony, timber access stair to kitchen, condenser cage to rear, additional car parking and reconfigured disabled parking and cycle stand area
site_address: Allerton Park Golf Course, Allerton Road, Liverpool, L18 3JT
